feed.title: Dagu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.9
entry.content:
This is a release to fix an issue in loading legacy basic authentication configurations.

Changelog

  • 557874ae8f969fe41369587b52ada8e95295f913 [#926] fix: set basicauth flag correctly when legacy config key specified (#929)

What's Changed

  • ci: add docker-next workflow and docs for next preview image by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/928
  • [#926] fix: set basicauth flag correctly when legacy config key specified by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/929

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.8...v1.16.9

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.10
entry.content:
This release includes a minor fix to the Docker image.

Changelog

  • c4bc4ee075c4a0f197387cf6782f426a559f7c83 chore: Fix docker image (#943)

What's Changed

  • chore: Fix the sudoers issue in the docker image by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/943

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.9...v1.16.10

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.11
entry.content:
This release includes a minor bug fix addressing #946, where the scheduler did not pass the custom config file path to DAG executions.

Changelog

  • 7a7ddbfcbd3e41ab4d44e466ae0c28061c55e130 [#946] fix: scheduler does not pass config file to DAG executions (#947)

What's Changed

  • feat: add --version and --install-dir options to installer.sh by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/944
  • [#946] fix: scheduler does not pass config file to DAG executions by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/947

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.16.10...v1.16.11

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.16.12
entry.content:
This release incledes a small follow-up fix to v1.16.11.

Changelog

  • 73386c947fb2664bfb4be522963638c99a62bc5a [#946] fix: ensure the same config file is passed down to retry and restart execution as wel (#948)
